page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: This 12 km-square block lies to the south-east of{CHELMSFORD}in the county of{ESSEX.} It is chiefly an area of farming - arable and fruit. There are several hamlets and only 2 villages of any size -{EAST {HANNINGFIELD}and{BICKNACRE.} East Hanningfield is a pretty Essex village with a great deal of history attached to it. Bicknacre is a zone of transition with a high mobility rate. The{leper hospital and cemetary}are of great interest, as is that part of the {National Trust}on the north boundary.
